title: Gearty Grilling: Connson Locke on the value of women in the workforce
itunes:author: Connson Locke
description: Contributor(s): Connson Locke | Connson Locke, Assistant Professor of Management, discusses her research which shows that organisations benefit from a more diverse workforce.
